text: THE HEAT-RAY IN THE CHOBHAM ROAD
title: The War of the Worlds

text: It is still a matter of wonder how the Martians are able to slay
title: The War of the Worlds

text: men so swiftly and so silently.  Many think that in some way they are
title: The War of the Worlds

title: The War of the Worlds

title: The War of the Worlds

text: against any object they choose, by means of a polished parabolic
title: The War of the Worlds

text: mirror of unknown composition, much as the parabolic mirror of a
title: The War of the Worlds

text: lighthouse projects a beam of light.  But no one has absolutely proved
title: The War of the Worlds

text: these details.  However it is done, it is certain that a beam of heat
title: The War of the Worlds

text: is the essence of the matter.  Heat, and invisible, instead of
title: The War of the Worlds

text: visible, light.  Whatever is combustible flashes into flame at its
title: The War of the Worlds

text: touch, lead runs like water, it softens iron, cracks and melts glass,
title: The War of the Worlds

text: My younger brother was in London when the Martians fell at Woking.
title: The War of the Worlds

title: The War of the Worlds
